SummaryEnglish: In a world of monsters, adventurers and magic, some of the most gifted healers are subjugated to brute force. Keyaru gains the ability to rewind time and turns the tables on those who’ve exploited him in this dark fantasy tale of vengeance and fury.
Aliases: 回復術士のやり直し テレビ放送ver
回復術士のやり直し 完全《回復》ver

1.SummaryEnglish: With the Demon Lord defeated, Keyaru’s revenge begins. The first step is to rewind time. Followed by planning...

2.SummaryEnglish: Flare has a dark side that Keyaru originally didn’t see until it was too late. Forgiveness isn’t something that he’s interested in now. So, he waits...

3.SummaryEnglish: One does not forget the past, even if it hasn’t happened yet. Many people remain unpunished. Getting to them may require help, though.

4.SummaryEnglish: How far will Setsuna go for revenge? Keyarga is curious to know.

5.TitleEnglish: The Healer Finds a New Toy!
5.SummaryEnglish: Keyarga’s actions have not gone unnoticed. He used the Krylet sword technique against Gioral soldiers. And one woman will not let the insult stand.

6.TitleEnglish: The Healer Sheds Blood and Tears!
6.SummaryEnglish: The cost of revenge is steep. Especially when innocents pay the price.

7.SummaryEnglish: They expected the Hero of Recovery. They planned on him being heroic. Unfortunately for them, Keyarga isn’t a hero.

8.TitleEnglish: The Healer Meets the Demon Lord!
8.SummaryEnglish: Keyarga knows this woman. She will become the Demon Lord and the enemy of all humankind. So, what is she doing in a city where humans and demonic beings coexist?

9.TitleEnglish: The Healer Takes Revenge for a Meal!
9.SummaryEnglish: Keyarga, Freia and Setsuna will protect Eve until she becomes the Demon Lord. But that protection comes at a price: The Philosopher’s Stone.

10.TitleEnglish: The Healer Becomes a Single, Lovely Flower!
10.SummaryEnglish: How does one catch a predator? Keyarga turns himself into the perfect bait.

11.TitleEnglish: The Healer is Troubled by Norn's Brutality!
11.SummaryEnglish: Keyarga takes his revenge on a so-called hero.

12.TitleEnglish: The Healer Starts a New Journey!
12.SummaryEnglish: An unexpected development catches Norn off guard. She needs another plan, but that assumes she can first survive Keyarga’s wrath.
